content: add some beauty warmth and function to your space with these flower power coasters these hexagon coasters use the puff and double_crochet stitch to create a beautiful snowflake design not only do these coasters work up quickly but they use less than 35 yards of yarn making them a great stash-buster project > the free pattern can be found ** here 1 ** > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout crochet skill level advanced beginner / intermediate other details * the pattern includes step-by-step pictures to help you * 4 5mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn is recommended for this project however you can substitute any yarn brand fiber or weight i hope you enjoy making and using your crochet coasters > other crochet patterns in the flower power collection * **flower power pillow** 2 * ** flower power blanket 3 ** * **flower power face pad** 4 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-flower-power-hexagon-coaster/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/flower-power-pillow-7 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/flower-power-blanket-7 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/threes-company-face-pad-set
